name: InventoryUnitLic
description: IM Inventory Unit License resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: licId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Unique identifier of a license (e.g. name, code)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: licType
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Describing type of current license (e.g. capacity, particular feature, no. of subscribers)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: validity
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: May include one of the elements duration, end (expiration date) or forever

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: key
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: License activation key according to the used licensing system

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: licActivationTime
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Date and time when the license was activated

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: salesUniqueId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Date of Manufacture of inventory unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nEList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitNE(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hWList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitHw(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sWList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitSw(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: mFunction
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the DN of related ManagedFunction
